survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Contactless Grocery Shopping Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have used contactless grocery shopping services to understand their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use contactless grocery shopping services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to simplify data collection.

script.question_text: How often do you use contactless grocery shopping services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following contactless grocery shopping features do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following contactless grocery shopping features do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for contactless grocery shopping services?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended format to capture detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for contactless grocery shopping services?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of contactless grocery shopping?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who answered Q1 with any option except 'This is my first time'
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for standardized responses.
